name: @ctohm/edge-resizer-docs
description: Clever routing to serve image variations using images.weserv.nl + cloudflare edge cache

scripts.docs:build: vitepress build . && cp -R images .vitepress/dist/images && cp favicon.svg .vitepress/dist/
scripts.docs:deploy: npm run docs:build  && npm run pages
scripts.docs: npx wrangler@beta pages dev -- npm run docs:dev

author: Felipe Figueroa <ffigueroa@ctohm.com>
